title.rendered: MASTERS IN DATA SCIENCE AND BUSINESS ANALYTICS

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” full_height=”yes” columns_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1621236108633{background-image: url(https://sdbi.in/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/Webp.net-resizeimage.jpg?id=16903) !important;}”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”16439″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_custom_heading text=”MASTERS IN DATA SCIENCE AND BUSINESS ANALYTICS (1 Semester at SDBI+2 Semesters at UNIC)” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1646334910293{padding-top: 4% !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_id=”Program”][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_custom_heading text=”Master” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_id=”inner-hdln”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”88″ el_id=”inner-menu”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″][vc_column_text]

The aim of this program is to provide the students with advanced technical skills and a scientific understanding of Data Science. Moreover, the MSc will aid students in developing research competency so they can design their own scientific methods pushing the frontiers of this new emerging field. Finally, special emphasis is given to the development of skills that are required by the relevant cutting-edge industries.

The program aims at providing students with:

  1. Providing students with the technical and analytical skills required for acquiring,managing, analyzing and extracting knowledge from heterogeneous data sources.
  2. Equipping students with critical skills to help them in making decisions on the appropriate data analysis pipeline by designing, implementing and evaluating a data science solution.
  3. Providing students with software engineering and machine learning skills to design and implement scalable, reliable and maintainable solutions for data-oriented problems.
  4. Enabling students to develop data programming skills for multiple business domains and possible challenges.
  5. In collaboration with experts from the industry, the student will be aware of the challenges that a professional comes across when moving from theory to practice in real world.
  6. Giving the opportunity to the student to work in real world problems with real data in collaboration with industrial partners.
  7. Preparing students to pursue a PhD in data science or to any other field where data science skills are required.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1621854459941{background-color: #d6d6d6 !important;}” el_id=”ProgrmStructure”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Program Structure” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23df3735″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

A student will be taking first semester at SDBI at Patkar- Varde College, University of Mumbai and complete the remaining 2 semesters at University of Nicosia Campus.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_id=”ProgramFees”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Program Fees” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23df3735″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

  • The total cost of the master’s programme is €12,060.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1621854475471{background-color: #424040 !important;}” el_id=”Eligibility”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Eligibility Criteria” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]

  1. A Bachelor Degree in numerate subjects such as, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, Biology, Economics, Electrical Engineering, from a recognized university with a CPA of at least 2.5.
  2. English Language Proficiency: Students may be required to take NEPTON, UNIC’s English Placement Test at no charge, before registering for classes.
  3. Students with the following English qualifications can register directly for their academic programme of study:
    • TOEFL – 500 and above
    • Computer-based TOEFL – 173 and above
    • Internet-based TOEFL – 61 and above
    • IELTS – 5.5 and above
  4. A student should submit the following documents:
    • Letters of Recommendation: Two recommendation letters from academic or professional advisors;
    • Personal Statement: A letter highlighting the applicant’s individual competences and strengths and providing his/her reflections regarding the expectations and value of the program as well as to his/her personal advancement and career development.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”fadeInUp” el_id=”CourseOutline”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Course Outline” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:left|color:%23df3735″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_row_inner gap=”25″][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Semester 1″ font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23df3735″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1621853721607{background-color: #d6d6d6 !important;}”][vc_column_text]

  1.  Data Programming
  2. Mathematics for Data Science
  3. Data Privacy and Ethics

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Semester 2″ font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23df3735″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1646334940242{background-color: #d6d6d6 !important;}”][vc_column_text]

  1. Machine Learning
  2. Managing and Visualizing Data
  3. Research Seminars and Methodology
  4. Project in Data Science

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Semester 3″ font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:center|color:%23df3735″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1646334950564{background-color: #d6d6d6 !important;}”][vc_column_text]

  1. Deep and Reinforcement Learning
  2. Big Data Management and Processing
  3. Artificial Intelligence
  4. Thesis

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeInUp” css=”.vc_custom_1621854494040{background-color: #df3735 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Already Made Up Your Mind?” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_btn title=”Apply Now” style=”3d” color=”mulled-wine” align=”center” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”fas fa-share” add_icon=”true” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fadmission.sdbi.in%2Fapp%2F%23%2Fauth%2Fregister”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
